Description:
Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns across various platforms.
Create engaging and relevant content for online channels.
Monitor and analyze the performance of campaigns, using data-driven insights to refine strategies.
Manage SEO and SEM activities to improve organic search rankings and drive paid traffic.
Utilize social media platforms to build brand awareness and engage with the audience.
Collaborate with design and content teams to develop compelling visuals and messaging.
Stay updated on industry trends and emerging digital tools to drive innovation in campaigns.
Measure and report on the success of digital marketing efforts to stakeholders.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Digital Media, or a related field.
Proven experience in developing and managing digital marketing campaigns.
Proficiency in using digital marketing tools and platforms (Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, etc.).
Solid understanding of SEO principles and best practices.
Familiarity with content management systems and social media scheduling tools.
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
Creative thinking and the ability to conceptualize and execute unique campaign ideas.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Detail-oriented with excellent project management and organizational abilities.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
